AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Payment Add Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Adds a payment to the system.
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Blackbaud Product Development

FormField.Caption: Constituent declines Gift Aid for this application
Constituent declines Gift Aid for this application
Benefits waived
FormField.Description: Indicates if the benefits for the donation portion of this payment were waived by the user.

FormField.Caption: Payment is anonymous
FormField.Description: Indicates if the donation portion of this payment was given anonymously.

FormField.Caption: Effort
FormField.Description: The mailing for the donation portion of this payment.

FormField.Caption: Inbound channel
FormField.Description: The channel for the donation portion of this payment.

FormField.Caption: Do not acknowledge
FormField.Description: Indicates if the donation portion of this payment should be acknowledged.

FormField.Caption: Do not receipt
FormField.Description: Indicates if the donation portion of this payment should be receipted.

FormField.Caption: Constituent declines Gift Aid for this application
Appraisal will be required to sell
